Articles.Content:
Well, as the thread title suggests, I think someone ( Someone important. A.K.A not me ) should make a poll weather once the devs add new planets this guys ideas should be considered as candidates. Before I link this to you, keep in mind HE IS NOT SUGGESTING ADDING THESE NOW. he is asking if WHEN they add new planets if some of his could be included. No raging >:C

LINK!!!! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35535-Possible-Planet-additions

Edit : Never mind. the comment bellow removes the need for a poll

Edited July 15, 2013 by Kerbalspacesammy

Well, as the thread title suggests, I think someone ( Someone important. A.K.A not me ) should make a poll weather once the devs add new planets these should be considered as candidates. Before I link this to you, keep in mind HE IS NOT SUGGESTING ADDING THESE NOW. he is asking if WHEN they add new planets if some of his could be included. No raging >:C

LINK!!!! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35535-Possible-Planet-additions

Those planets are too big to be in the stock game. They're a nice work, but way way way too big. Anyway, there's one or two planets to add to the current solar system, and most likely those will be gas giants.

The devs noticed his work, IIRC, Nova commented in that thread. If they want to work with him to add his planet ideas, they'll contact him, don't worry.
